product_name: Speck Durafolio Tablet Case - iPad Air
long_description: The slim, military-grade Speck Durafolio Tablet Case for iPad(R) Air features an adjustable stand and delivers unsurpassed impact protection via a dual-layer design. Slim profile and durable, textured finishes; sleek, mighty construction with reinforced textured grip. Magnetic cover helps protect your screen while in the closed position. Magnet turns iPad on and off automatically for sleep/wake functionality. The Speck Durafolio Tablet Case features multiple viewing angles, plus integrated typing mode.
short_description: The slim, military-grade Speck Durafolio Tablet Case for iPad(R) Air features an adjustable stand and delivers unsurpassed impact protection via a dual-layer design.
